## when() function

Conditionally render a node.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function when(condition: boolean, node: ViewNode): ViewNode;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

condition


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

Boolean condition to test


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

node


</td><td>

[ViewNode](./dsl.viewnode.md)


</td><td>

View node to render if condition is true


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[ViewNode](./dsl.viewnode.md)

The node if condition is true, empty string otherwise

## Remarks

Returns the node if the condition is true, otherwise returns an empty string.

## Example


```typescript
vstack(
  text('Always visible'),
  when(state.showHelp, text('Help text'))
)
```
